summary: Makes you fight more Female Bandits, Thalmor, and Forsworn
descriptionHtml:
Mod for Ryona Gamers.

Should be no conflicts, simply edited most (not all) male warriors to female, with their respective voices.

Don\'t know how to replace the head mesh, so if someone could tell me, I can put in a description so other people will know.

Install in your Skyrim/Data Folder

Recommended Mods 

CBBE Body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666

CBBE Body Replacer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13180

CBBE Armor Replacer - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004

CBBE Athletic texture (Curvy Body)- http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16731

Duel (Must have for Combat Characters) - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2700

Dance Of Death (More Killmoves) -  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10906
author: Soldier321
